Text:
I was going to download this Webrip, but if your going to upload the HD version later today I'll wait for that then...

Thanks

PS - For a 20 min show, why is this webrip video so big? (488 mb)
The webrip I converted from a flv to avi with 1000kbps & 29 fps is only 160 mb. 
I up'ed it to show you...

File size could have been smaller, sorry for that! 

I will upload WS.DSR version which has 93MB only. For those who have limited bandwidth.

I set quality to auto, and it made it over 3000kbps. My bad, I always learn something new.

However, this is not a WebRip.

It's still way too big for a 20 minute TV show.
It's almost three times bigger than It should be.
Unless you have unlimited bandwidth, a smaller file size is preferred.
